abstract: The criminal complaint on Thursday offers insight into the direction of the investigation and potential developments.
snippet: The criminal complaint on Thursday offers insight into the direction of the investigation and potential developments.
lead_paragraph: With the arrest of four defendants, including three experts, on insider trading, federal prosecutors continue to crack down on the disclosure of confidential information. The criminal complaint filed on Thursday contains a wealth of details about the direction of the investigation — and gives some indication about potential developments.

headline.main: What the New Insider Trading Cases Mean

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
